content.en: Optimizing Photonic Crystals: Researchers have been exploring various optimization algorithms to improve the design of photonic crystals. These algorithms, such as the Modified truncated Newton gradient search, evolutionary optimization, genetic algorithms, Nelder-Mead simplex algorithm, and hybrid optimization techniques, are being used to optimize the bandgap, construct multiple one-dimensional photonic crystals, shape beams, and design structures with negative refraction. These advancements in algorithmic design are helping to expedite the discovery of optimal solutions and enhance the performance of photonic devices.
content.da: Optimering af fotoniske krystaller: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige optimeringsalgoritmer for at forbedre designet af fotoniske krystaller. Disse algoritmer, såsom den modificerede trunkerede Newton-gradient-søgning, evolutionær optimering, genetiske algoritmer, Nelder-Mead simplex-algoritmen og hybridoptimeringsteknikker, bliver brugt til at optimere båndgab, konstruere flere endimensionelle fotoniske krystaller, forme stråler og designe strukturer med negativ brydning. Disse fremskridt inden for algoritmisk design hjælper med at fremskynde opdagelsen af optimale løsninger og forbedre ydeevnen af fotoniske enheder.
